DataElement.preferredName: Vital Signs Body Mass Index Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The calculated quantity of an individual's weight to height ratio represented as a numerical value.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Vital Signs Domain Vital Signs Body Mass Index
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to vital sign._Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes._An individual's weight in kilograms divided by the square of the height in meters.
